Title: Requires comprehensive eye examinations for certain public school students
Summary: Relates to in-school vision examination screenings for students ages three to five; establishes parent notification requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง905, Ed L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to required vision screenings for public school students; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the school vision examination screening fund
